title: Trend Micro Cloud One - Workload Security Insights
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of workload security insights

definition.content:
[Trend Micro Cloud One](https://cloudone.trendmicro.com/) is a cloud-native security platform designed to protect multi-cloud and hybrid environments like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. It provides unified protection across workloads, files, and networks, all managed from a single console.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of workload security insights.

For more information, see the [Trend Micro Cloud One Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/trend_micro_cloud_one/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using trend micro cloud one logs forwarded via a [Datadog Agent](https://docs.datadoghq.com/agent).
- Please follow the **Installation** and **Configuration** steps [here](/integrations/trend-micro-cloud-one) to enable log collection.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates **Trend Micro Cloud One** Events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
